products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bright Orange - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1273 Sunny Orange - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1273 sunny orange - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1267 burned orange - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Sunny Orange (1273)
products.description: The velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside. Softly diffuses incoming daylight. Elegant, decorative lighting effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Slim, elegant side rails and top case. Installs in minutes.

products.title: Orange (1161)
products.description: The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy. Blackout effect. Flexible and stepless positioning. Improved insulation.
